snippet: Martin Schulz warned against the rise of the far right in Europe and pledged to defend the bloc against American technology companies.
lead_paragraph: Martin Schulz warned against the rise of the far right in Europe and pledged to defend the bloc against American technology companies.

headline.main: E.U. Commission Candidate Seeks More Privacy and Less Extremism
headline.print_headline: E.U. Commission Candidate Seeks More Privacy and Less Extremism
